p: We used R Statistical Software (version 3.5.1) for data cleaning and analysis [ 25]. Descriptive statistics were determined for socio-demographic and other characteristics comparing pig workers and non-pig workers. Categorical variables were compared using chi-square test and Fisherâ€™s exact test while continuous variables were compared using the Student t test. The cumulative incidence for ARI was calculated as the number of episodes reported by participants divided by the total number of participants.
